word: Not without a struggle could Jesus listen in silence to the archdeceiver. But the Son of God was not to prove His divinity to Satan. He met the tempter with the words of Scripture. \93It is written,\94 He said, \93Man shall not live by bread alone, but by every word that proceedeth out of the mouth of God.\94 In every temptation the weapon of His warfare was the Word of God.
